channel.title: Half-Life is just a better version of DOOM
channel.description:
ok dont get me wrong, i love Half-Life, I love DOOM, but i realized just a couple of minuets ago why i love them so much. Ok Half-life is just another version fo doom, in doom you dont see how the accident happend but the demon were transported from hell cuz scientist accidently opened a portal to hell, and all the demons came threw, in Half-life you accidently open a portal to Zen were all the aliens come threw that way too. In doom your trying to get off of mars, in Half-life your trying to get out of Black Mesa.
Now heres the difference that people will argue...
in Half-life the military comes and kills everyone, there is no masterious person in doom like there is in Half-life (im talking about gman)
ya thats about it, please tell me what you think

item.title: Half-Life is just a better version of DOOM
item.dc:creator: JohnKiller118
item.description:
@ The OP: Wow, amazing find! What a stunning realization! And for that…

SolidSnake9001:

quake was a rip-off of doom even though it was made by the same ppl

Then it wasn’t a rip-off. It was a “spiritual successor.”
Everything about you, from your avatar, your name, to your signature, I love.

Read full topic
item.source: Half-Life is just a better version of DOOM

item.title: Half-Life is just a better version of DOOM
item.dc:creator: Bolteh
item.description:
Ramirezoid:

Doom 3 is the official remake of Doom.

Half-Life is bscly what Avatar is to FernGully.

Ferngully rawks.

Read full topic
item.source: Half-Life is just a better version of DOOM

item.title: Half-Life is just a better version of DOOM
item.dc:creator: baconeggs
item.description:
NickAVV:

Okay, first of all based on the story it sounds like you’re talking about DOOM 3. Secondly, DOOM 3 came out after Half Life, and therefore DOOM 3 “is just another version” of Half Life. Half Life was a trendsetter.

gordonfreemantshephard:

amazing, you just realized something the obvious fact that everybody already knew about long before the forums

Ramirezoid:

Doom 3 is the official remake of Doom.

Half-Life is bscly what Avatar is to FernGully.

Deathmonkey7:

Doom 1 followed a similar story to Doom 3, the only difference being that you weren’t transported to hell in the original so much as you naturally went to hell. The story wasn’t well conveyed in-game though, but you can find it in the Doom manual, and you can read about all the cutscenes they originally had planned in the Doom Bible. Interesting stuff in there.

378×512 100 KB

Seriously guys

Read full topic

item.title: Half-Life is just a better version of DOOM
item.dc:creator: Phase
item.description:
Shasta:

Nope, you just screwed up and are trying to make not one, but several alternate excuses to cover it up. You should have just accepted your mistake and moved on, now you just look even more foolish.

Fine, I’m an idiot, I don’t really care.

JohnWorfin:

I thought it was Pocahontas in space

I thought it was Dances With Smurfs.

Read full topic

item.title: Half-Life is just a better version of DOOM
item.dc:creator: Ballsopt
item.description:
y’know, Half life is basically The Mist set in New Mexico, from the science team’s perspective… And the Mist is older than Doom (though certainly not the first portal unleashing horrors from beyond premise), so I think HL1 was following The Mist more if anything. Not to mention Valve has frequently acknowledged the Mist as their main inspiration for the BM incident.

Read full topic

item.title: Half-Life is just a better version of DOOM
item.dc:creator: Deathmonkey7
item.description:
NickAVV:

Okay, first of all based on the story it sounds like you’re talking about DOOM 3. Secondly, DOOM 3 came out after Half Life, and therefore DOOM 3 “is just another version” of Half Life. Half Life was a trendsetter.

Doom 1 followed a similar story to Doom 3, the only difference being that you weren’t transported to hell in the original so much as you naturally went to hell. The story wasn’t well conveyed in-game though, but you can find it in the Doom manual, and you can read about all the cutscenes they originally had planned in the Doom Bible. Interesting stuff in there.

Read full topic

item.title: Half-Life is just a better version of DOOM
item.dc:creator: Shasta
item.description:
Phase:

The implication was that he would subsequently kill himself or die in some other manner.

This, or an underlying sense of hypocrisy in my own post, ironically calling someone an idiot while making a factual error myself, would be the humor inherent in my response.

Try to know the intentions of those you insult.

Nope, you just screwed up and are trying to make not one, but several alternate excuses to cover it up. You should have just accepted your mistake and moved on, now you just look even more foolish.

Read full topic
